data.name: The Last Spell - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Last Spell - Original Soundtrack will give you the strengh and courage to defend the last bastion of humanity. Survive the hordes of bloodthirsty monsters until The Last Spell is cast and banishes them all.

Track List


1 - Commander's Theme - 1:49
2 - In Memoriam - 1:43
3 - Distant Memories - 4:27
4 - Mist - 1:33
5 - A Sea Of Laments - 3:11
6 - Hordes Descend
7 - The Spirits - 1:54
8 - Invocation - 3:28
9 - All Hope Gone - 2:26
10 - Tainted Essence - 2:22
11 - Nocturnus - 4:49
12 - Awake In The Dark - 2:03
13 - Oraculum - 2:22
14 - Shadow Battles - 2:20
15 - The Great War - 3:05
16 - The Infected Lands - 3:41
17 - Oath - 2:53
18 - Erebus - 3:43
19 - Possessed - 2:46
20 - A Mission - 2:28
21 - Old Woods - 4:47
22 - Forgotten - 2:37
23 - Wild Hearts - 3:47
24 - Creeps - 2:33
25 - Bleak Visions - 5:00

Composed by Rémi "The Algorithm" Gallego, this 25 tracks album will guide you through the strange purple mist.
